page.title: 15Events in Newton and Linton
page.content: Eagerly awaited events in the villages include:- 1.The Newton-on-Ouse Church Garden Party in July in the Old Vicarage garden.Stallholders sell cakes,gifts plants and ice-cream and other goods, and afternoon tea is served.Proceeds are for Church funds. 2.Newton Primary School Rose Festival in July when the Rose Queen is crowned and children dance round the maypole. 3.A village sports day organised by the Playing Field Committee. 4.Rememberance Day,when men from R.A.F.Linton-on-Ouse join with parishioners in the Parish Church for a service.Two minutes silence is observed and the British Legion and the R.A.F. present poppy wreaths. 5.Bonfire Fayre and fireworks display at R.A.F. Linton on the Sat. nearest to Nov.5th.Proceeds for charities.
